mapper.insert: INSERT INTO language(languageno, filmno, en, ch, es, fr, ar, rs, pt, de, jp, hi, kr) VALUES (#{filmno}, #{filmno}, #{en}, #{ch}, #{es}, #{fr}, #{ar}, #{rs}, #{pt}, #{de}, #{jp}, #{hi}, #{kr})
mapper.select: SELECT languageno, filmno, en, ch, es, fr, ar, rs, pt, de, jp, hi, kr FROM language ORDER BY filmno
